timeline.bodyText: Is it OK to ignore offline regions?  The old code kept retrying until all regions were online.  Could we potentially end up not scanning all rows in the table?
timeline.author: msirek

replies.bodyText:
HRegionLocation.getServerName() == null causes the NPE. I believe it's an issue in HBase itself as serverName is used in HRegionLocation.hashCode() and throws NPE when null (making such HRegionLocation instances poorly defined and unusable).
In fact, ClusterConnection.locateRegions(..., false) already ensures that such locations are filtered out. I make that condition explicit..
replies.author: OlegMazurov
